mND 0.1.7

    Network Diffusion using

    ND_s.Rd

    Network Diffusion using

    Usage

    ND_s(
  X0,
  W,
  alpha = 0.7,
  nMax = 10000,
  eps = 1e-06,
  final.smooth = FALSE,
  all.steps = FALSE,
  verbose = FALSE
)

    Arguments

    X0

    matrix composed of column vectors with initial distribution of information

    W

    symmetrically normalized adjacency matrix W = D^-1 A D^-1, see 'normalize_adj_mat' function

    alpha

    numeric, the smothing factor

    nMax

    numeric, maximum number of iterations

    eps

    numeric, the iteration will stop when the maximum difference between matrix Xs between two consecutive iteraction is smaller than eps

    final.smooth

    TRUE/FALSE, whether to do the final step of smoothing

    all.steps,

    TRUE/FALSE, whether to store all steps

    verbose,

    TRUE/FALSE

    Value

    a list with:

    • Xt the smoothed matrix;

    • eps see above;

    • max.abs.diff max(abs(F_t) - abs(F_t-1));

    • Xs.all transient Xs matrices.
